content.question:
​

The x axis ranges from negative 7 to 4 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 5 to 40 in increments of 5. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right: 

The curve enters the window at (negative 6.2 comma negative 7.5). 

The curve crosses the x axis at (negative 6 comma 0) and gradually levels off to a high point at (negative 4 comma 33). 

The curve gradually starts decreasing, gets steeper until about (negative 2 comma 18) then gradually levels off to a low point at (0 comma 2). 

The curve gradually increases to the point (1 comma 8) and continues getting steeper until exiting the window at (2.2 comma 42.5).

​The graph of the function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is shown. On which of the following intervals is the graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> concave down?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 4 close parentheses union open parentheses 0 comma infinity close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mo>∪</mo><mfenced><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced></math>
​<math alttext="open parentheses negative 2 comma infinity close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
